## Adjust School Capacity (Redux)
### Updated for 1.3.6* and Bridges DLC!
Customize how many students your schools can handle without adding more buildings.
- Separate sliders for **Elementary**, **High School**, **College**, and **University** - Capacity range from **10% to 500%** of vanilla values - **Reset to Vanilla** button: all sliders back to 100% (game default) - **Quick Start values** button: reset to ASC Defaults button 200 / 150 / 120 / 120
### Supports 9 languages - English, Français French, Deutsch German, Español Spanish, Italiano Italian - 日本語 Japanese, 한국어 Korean, 简体中文 Simplified Chinese, 繁體中文 Traditional Chinese
### Technical Notes - Safe to remove or disable at any time (just set the sliders to 100% for vanilla values) - Remove any other school capacity mods to avoid conflicts. - Does not use Reflection or Harmony - means safe, lightweight, and more resilient to game updates.
